ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!
ygData.msgSnippet: Might be because they havent fixed all the graphic problems yet.  I have an 1.8Mhz system and most of the game runs slick.  Some zones like the Oasis is really
ygData.messageBody:
Might be because they havent fixed all the graphic problems yet. I have an
1.8Mhz system and most of the game runs slick. Some zones like the Oasis is
really laggy at times.. (like trying to run through some thick soup) They
mention today that there was a bug that caused lag when you had your
particle effects off, of all things. Not sure what the problem is but give
them a few days to figure it out.. They are still iorning out some of the
visible lag related issues.

If ya can.. Post more of the equipment you have.. More information to work
with.

-----Original Message-----
From: Justin [mailto:blackcatsg@...]
Sent: Monday, December 10, 2001 2:00 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!


Why do I get lag on 512 MB ram and a 950 MHz chip and I have Luclin? I
also have a broadband connection. Thank s for the help
